TAPPA - Tübingen PhD and Postdoc Assembly, background shows a network of people.

TAPPA stands for Tübingen AI PhD and Postdoc Assembly and is a grassroots initiative to bring together PhD students and Postdocs doing research in AI in Tübingen. It is similar in spirit to a student council: the goal is to enhance the PhD and Postdoc experience within the Tübingen AI ecosystem by addressing common concerns, organizing events, and more.

TAPPA meetings

Usually, we meet on the 1st Thursday of the month, 17.00-18.00.

The location alternates between MPI-IS and MvL6 (Maria-von-Linden-Straße 6).

Upcoming meetings

Current News and Events

Tübingen Pre-NeurIPS Fest Upcoming

Dear all, the end of the year 2024 is coming closer! We would like to celebrate the approaching end of this academic year with the second edition of the Tübingen Pre-NeurIPS Fest, a poster session followed by a festive get-together:

November 15, 2024
